Name: methemoglobinemia
Definition: A polycythemia that_has_material_basis in factors intrinsic to red cell precursors.

Name: hemoglobin C disease
Definition: A chronic lymphocytic leukemia that is characterized by over production of B cells (lymphocytes) by the bone marrow where the B cells appear hairy under a microscope.

Name: hemoglobin D disease
Definition: A hemangiopericytoma that is manifested in the breast.

Name: hemoglobin E disease
Definition: A hemangiopericytoma that is manifested in the breast.
